description:
Barbary is one tough bitch and decides to give me the challenge of breaking her. She claims she can take what I dish out, so I make sure I give this pain slut an extra helping of sadistic torment. Her body and flesh is devastated from excessive impact form floggers. She is hit with every flogger we have to ensure she gets the pain she came for.
Next she is helpless in a straight jacket that is bound to the ceiling. A blindfold is added and then we do the unthinkable; you'll have to watch to know what happens next. Then she is attacked with a dragon tail on every available piece of flesh.
In the final scene she has the only part of her body that hasn't been touched destroyed. The sensitive sole and the palms of her hands get the full treatment. They are caned, flogged, and prodded. The final orgasms drain what little energy she had left.
title: Challenge Accepted - Barbary Rose is Destroyed with Extreme Torment!!
